solution_line_template: Since 1 dozen is equal to {dozen}, then the vendor sold {lemons_dozen} x {dozen} = <<{lemons_dozen}*{dozen}={lemons_count}>>{lemons_count} lemons.
So, the fruit vendor sold a total of {lemons_count} + {avocados_count} = <<{lemons_count}+{avocados_count}={total_fruits}>>{total_fruits} fruits.
